mapper.select: SELECT KNR.REQ_ID -- .ID , KNR.REQ_SHZ -- . , CDM.VALUE1_KANJ AS REQ_STS_NM -- . , KNR.REQ_JGI_NAME -- . , KNR.REQ_YMDHMS -- . , KNR.SHN_SHA_ID -- . , KNR.SHN_YMDHMS -- . , KNR.APR_SHA_ID -- . , KNR.APR_YMDHMS -- . , KNR.REQ_JGI_NO -- . , KNR.REQ_BR_CODE -- . , KNR.REQ_DIST_CODE -- . , KNR.REQ_STS -- . , KNR.REQ_CHL , KNR.SHN_JGI_NO -- . , KNR.APR_JGI_NO -- . , TO_CHAR(KNR.UPD_SHA_YMD,'YYYYMMDDhh24miss') AS UPD_SHA_YMD -- . , ULT.DCF_ISHI_CD -- ULT_MDB.DCF , ULT.ISHI_NM -- ULT_MDB. , ULT.ISHI_NM_KANA -- ULT_MDB. , HCP.DOC_TYPE -- _. , HCP.SEX -- _. , HCP.DOC_KANJ_SEI -- _. , HCP.DOC_KANJ_MEI -- _. , HCP.DOC_KANA_SEI -- _. , HCP.DOC_KANA_MEI -- _. , HCP.OLD_KANJ_SEI -- _. , HCP.OLD_KANA_SEI -- _. , HCP.NEW_NAME_ST_YYYY -- _. , HCP.NEW_NAME_ST_MM -- _. , HCP.NEW_NAME_ST_DD -- _. , HCP.DOB_YYYY -- _. , HCP.DOB_MM -- _. , HCP.DOB_DD -- _. , HCP.HOME_TOWN -- _. , HCP.MED_SCH -- _. , HCP.GRAD_YEAR -- _. , HCP.EMPL_YEAR -- _. , HCP.H_UNIV -- _. , SBS.DEPT_KJ AS HOME_DEPT_NM -- _(). , HCP.SP_LIVER -- _. , HCP.SP_DISEASE -- _. , HCP.SP_COM -- _. , HCP.HOME_DEPT_CODE -- _. , HCO.INS_ABBR_NAME AS SK_INS_NM -- _. , HCO.HO_INS_TYPE , HCO.INS_CLASS , HCP.UNIV_POS_CODE -- _. , SBK.DEPT_KJ AS SK_DEPT_NM -- _(). , HCP.TITLE_CODE -- _. , HCP.JOB_FORM -- _. , HCP.DCC_TYPE -- _. , HCP.INS_NO_SK -- _. , HCP.DEPT_CODE -- _. , KNR.REQ_COMMENT -- . , KNR.APR_MEMO -- . , KNR.APR_COMMENT -- . , KNR.SHN_FLG -- . FROM T_RDM_REQ_KNR KNR --- INNER JOIN T_RDM_HCP_REQ HCP ---_ ON 1=1 AND HCP.REQ_ID = KNR.REQ_ID LEFT JOIN M_RDM_HCO_MST HCO ---_ ON 1=1 AND HCO.INS_NO = HCP.INS_NO_SK LEFT JOIN M_RDM_HCP_SHOZOKU_BUKA SBS -- _ ON 1=1 AND SBS.DEPT_CODE = HCP.HOME_DEPT_CODE AND SBS.DEL_FLG = '0' LEFT JOIN M_RDM_HCP_SHOZOKU_BUKA SBK -- _ ON SBK.DEPT_CODE = HCP.DEPT_CODE AND SBK.DEL_FLG = '0' LEFT JOIN T_RDM_M_MDB_HCP_MST ULT -- ULT_MDB ON 1=1 AND ULT.DCF_ISHI_CD = HCP.ULT_DOC_NO LEFT JOIN M_RDM_CODE_MST CDM -- ON 1=1 AND CDM.CODE_NAME = 'REQ_STS' AND CDM.DEL_FLG = '0' AND CDM.VALUE1 = KNR.REQ_STS WHERE 1=1 AND KNR.REQ_ID = #{inReqId}

WITH ULT_KINMUSAKI AS ( SELECT DCF_ISHI_CD , MIN(KINMUSAKI_SHISETSU_CD) AS KINMUSAKI_SHISETSU_CD FROM T_RDM_M_MDB_HCP_KINMUSAKI -- ULT_MDB WHERE 1=1 AND DCF_ISHI_CD = #{inUltDocNo} GROUP BY DCF_ISHI_CD ) SELECT ULT.DCF_ISHI_CD -- ULT_MDB.DCF , ULT.ISHI_NM -- ULT_MDB. , ULT.ISHI_NM_KANA -- ULT_MDB. , ULT.SEIBETSU_CD AS SEX -- ULT_MDB. , SUBSTR(ULT.ISHI_NM,1,INSTR(ULT.ISHI_NM,'') - 1 ) AS DOC_KANJ_SEI -- ULT_MDB. , SUBSTR(ULT.ISHI_NM,INSTR(ULT.ISHI_NM,'') + 1 ) AS DOC_KANJ_MEI -- ULT_MDB. , SUBSTR(ULT.ISHI_NM_KANA,1,INSTR(ULT.ISHI_NM_KANA,' ') - 1) AS DOC_KANA_SEI -- ULT_MDB. , SUBSTR(ULT.ISHI_NM_KANA,INSTR(ULT.ISHI_NM_KANA,' ') + 1) AS DOC_KANA_MEI -- ULT_MDB. , SUBSTR(ULT.SEINENGAPPI_SR,1,4) AS NEW_NAME_ST_YYYY -- ULT_MDB.()14 , SUBSTR(ULT.SEINENGAPPI_SR,5,2) AS NEW_NAME_ST_MM -- ULT_MDB.()56 , SUBSTR(ULT.SEINENGAPPI_SR,7,2) AS NEW_NAME_ST_DD -- ULT_MDB.()78 , CDM.VALUE1 AS HOME_TOWN -- ().1 , SJM.UNIV_CODE AS MED_SCH -- _. , ULT.SOTSUNEN_SR AS GRAD_YEAR -- ULT_MDB.() , HCO.INS_ABBR_NAME AS SK_INS_NM -- _. , HCO.HO_INS_TYPE , HCO.INS_CLASS , YUV.TITLE_CODE AS UNIV_POS_CODE -- _(). , SBK.DEPT_KJ AS SK_DEPT_NM -- _(). , YAK.TITLE_CODE AS TITLE_CODE -- _(). , HCO.INS_NO AS INS_NO_SK -- _. , SJM.DEPT_CODE AS DEPT_CODE -- _. , ULT.MDB_KBN FROM T_RDM_M_MDB_HCP_MST ULT -- ULT_MDB LEFT JOIN ULT_KINMUSAKI KIM -- ULT_MDB ON KIM.DCF_ISHI_CD = ULT.DCF_ISHI_CD LEFT JOIN T_RDM_M_MDB_HCP_KINMUSAKI KID -- ULT_MDB ON 1=1 AND KID.DCF_ISHI_CD = KIM.DCF_ISHI_CD AND KID.KINMUSAKI_SHISETSU_CD = KIM.KINMUSAKI_SHISETSU_CD LEFT JOIN M_RDM_HCO_MST HCO ---_ ON 1=1 AND HCO.ULT_INS_NO = KID.KINMUSAKI_SHISETSU_CD LEFT JOIN M_RDM_CODE_MST CDM -- ON 1=1 AND CDM.CODE_NAME = 'HOME_TOWN' AND CDM.DEL_FLG = '0' AND CDM.VALUE2 = ULT.SYUSHIN_KEN_CD LEFT JOIN M_RDM_HCP_SHUSSHINKO_LNK_MST SJM -- _ ON 1=1 AND SJM.SHUSSHINKO_CD = ULT.SHUSSHINKO_CD LEFT JOIN M_RDM_HCP_YAKUSHOKU_LNK_MST YUV -- _ ON 1=1 AND YUV.YAKUSHOKU_CD = KID.DAIGAKU_SHOKUI_CD LEFT JOIN M_RDM_HCP_YAKUSHOKU_LNK_MST YAK -- _ ON 1=1 AND YAK.YAKUSHOKU_CD = KID.YAKUSHOKU_CD LEFT JOIN M_RDM_HCP_SHOZOKU_BUKA_LNK_MST SJM -- _ ON 1=1 AND SJM.SHOZOKU_BUKA_CD = KID.SHOZOKUBUKA_CD LEFT JOIN M_RDM_HCP_SHOZOKU_BUKA SBK -- _ ON 1=1 AND SBK.DEPT_CODE = SJM.DEPT_CODE AND SBK.DEL_FLG = '0' WHERE 1=1 AND ult.DCF_ISHI_CD = #{inUltDocNo}
SELECT UPD_SHA_YMD ,UPD_SHA_ID FROM T_RDM_HCP_REQ WHERE REQ_ID = #{reqId} FOR UPDATE NOWAIT
mapper.update: UPDATE T_RDM_HCP_REQ SET DOC_NO = NULL,DOC_NO = #{docNo}, DOC_TYPE = NULL,DOC_TYPE = #{docType}, DOC_KANJ = NULL,DOC_KANJ = #{docKanj}, DOC_KANA = NULL,DOC_KANA = #{docKana}, DOC_KANJ_SEI = NULL,DOC_KANJ_SEI = #{docKanjiSei}, DOC_KANJ_MEI = NULL,DOC_KANJ_MEI = #{docKanjiMei}, DOC_KANA_SEI = NULL,DOC_KANA_SEI = #{docKanaSei}, DOC_KANA_MEI = NULL,DOC_KANA_MEI = #{docKanaMei}, OLD_KANJ_SEI = NULL,OLD_KANJ_SEI = #{oldKanjSei}, OLD_KANA_SEI = NULL,OLD_KANA_SEI = #{oldKanaSei}, NEW_NAME_ST_YYYY = NULL,NEW_NAME_ST_YYYY = #{newNameStYear}, NEW_NAME_ST_MM = NULL,NEW_NAME_ST_MM = #{newNameStMonth}, NEW_NAME_ST_DD = NULL,NEW_NAME_ST_DD = #{newNameStDay}, DOB_YYYY = NULL,DOB_YYYY = #{dobYear}, DOB_MM = NULL,DOB_MM = #{dobMonth}, DOB_DD = NULL,DOB_DD = #{dobDay}, SEX = NULL,SEX = #{sexCd}, HOME_TOWN = NULL,HOME_TOWN = #{homeTownCd}, MED_SCH = NULL,MED_SCH = #{medSchoolCd}, GRAD_YEAR = NULL,GRAD_YEAR = #{gradYear}, HOME_DEPT_CODE = NULL,HOME_DEPT_CODE = #{homeDeptCd}, H_UNIV = NULL,H_UNIV = #{homeUnivCd}, EMPL_YEAR = NULL,EMPL_YEAR = #{emplYear}, SP_LIVER = NULL,SP_LIVER = #{spLiverCd}, SP_DISEASE = NULL,SP_DISEASE = #{spDiseaseCd}, SP_COM = NULL,SP_COM = #{spCom}, INS_NO_SK = NULL,INS_NO_SK = #{skInsNo}, JOB_FORM = NULL,JOB_FORM = #{skJobForm}, DEPT_CODE = NULL,DEPT_CODE = #{skDeptCd}, UNIV_POS_CODE = NULL,UNIV_POS_CODE = #{skUnivPosCd}, TITLE_CODE = NULL,TITLE_CODE = #{skTitleCd}, DCC_TYPE = NULL,DCC_TYPE = #{skDcctype}, ULT_DOC_NO = NULL,ULT_DOC_NO = #{ultDocNo}, MDM_ID = NULL,MDM_ID = #{mdmId}, DOC_ATTRIBUTE = NULL,DOC_ATTRIBUTE = #{docAttribute}, DEL_REASON = NULL,DEL_REASON = #{delReason}, DEL_YMD = NULL,DEL_YMD = #{delYMD}, DUP_DOC_NO = NULL,DUP_DOC_NO = #{dupDocNo}, RST_REASON = NULL,RST_REASON = #{rstReason}, UPD_SHA_YMD = NULL,UPD_SHA_YMD = #{updShaYmd}, UPD_SHA_ID = NULLUPD_SHA_ID = #{updShaId} WHERE REQ_ID = #{reqId}
mapper.select: SELECT KNR.REQ_ID FROM T_RDM_HCP_REQ HCP --_ INNER JOIN T_RDM_REQ_KNR KNR -- ON KNR.REQ_ID = HCP.REQ_ID WHERE KNR.REQ_TYPE = '31' AND KNR.REQ_STS IN ('11','03','13','04','14') AND HCP.ULT_DOC_NO = #{inUltDocNo} AND KNR.REQ_ID != #{inReqId}

SELECT KNR.REQ_ID FROM T_RDM_HCO_REQ HCO --_ INNER JOIN T_RDM_REQ_KNR KNR -- ON KNR.REQ_ID = HCO.REQ_ID WHERE KNR.REQ_TYPE = '03' AND KNR.REQ_STS IN ('03','13','04','14') AND HCO.INS_NO = #{skInsNo} UNION SELECT '0' FROM M_RDM_HCO_MST HCO --_ WHERE HCO.DEL_KBN IN ('1','2','3') AND HCO.INS_NO = #{skInsNo}

SELECT KNR.REQ_ID -- .ID , KNR.REQ_SHZ -- . , CDM.VALUE1_KANJ AS REQ_STS_NM -- . , KNR.REQ_JGI_NAME -- . , KNR.REQ_YMDHMS -- . , KNR.SHN_SHA_ID -- . , KNR.SHN_YMDHMS -- . , KNR.APR_SHA_ID -- . , AS UPD_SHA_YMD -- . , ULT.DCF_ISHI_CD -- ULT_MDB.DCF , ULT.ISHI_NM -- ULT_MDB. , ULT.ISHI_NM_KANA -- ULT_MDB. , HCP.DOC_TYPE -- _. , HCP.SEX -- _. , HCP.DOC_KANJ_SEI -- _. , HCP.DOC_KANJ_MEI -- _. , HCP.DOC_KANA_SEI -- _. , HCP.DOC_KANA_MEI -- _. , HCP.OLD_KANJ_SEI -- _. , HCP.OLD_KANA_SEI -- _. , HCP.NEW_NAME_ST_YYYY -- _. , HCP.NEW_NAME_ST_MM -- _. , HCP.NEW_NAME_ST_DD -- _. , HCP.DOB_YYYY -- _. , HCP.DOB_MM -- _. , HCP.DOB_DD -- _. , HCP.HOME_TOWN -- _. , HCP.MED_SCH -- _. , HCP.GRAD_YEAR -- _. , HCP.EMPL_YEAR -- _. , HCP.H_UNIV -- _. , SBS.DEPT_KJ AS HOME_DEPT_NM -- _(). , HCP.SP_LIVER -- _. , HCP.SP_DISEASE -- _. , HCP.SP_COM -- _. , HCP.HOME_DEPT_CODE -- _. , HCO.INS_ABBR_NAME AS SK_INS_NM -- _. , HCO.HO_INS_TYPE , HCO.INS_CLASS , HCP.UNIV_POS_CODE -- _. , SBK.DEPT_KJ AS SK_DEPT_NM -- _(). , HCP.TITLE_CODE -- _. , HCP.JOB_FORM -- _. , HCP.DCC_TYPE -- _. , HCP.INS_NO_SK -- _. , HCP.DEPT_CODE -- _. , KNR.REQ_COMMENT -- . , KNR.APR_MEMO -- . , KNR.SHN_FLG -- . , KNR.REQ_CHL -- . , KNR.APR_COMMENT -- . , CDMDT.VALUE1_KANJ AS DOC_TYPE_NM , CDMMF.VALUE1_KANJ AS SEX_NM , CDMHT.VALUE1_KANJ AS HOME_TOWN_NM , SKOM.UNIV_KJ AS MED_SCH_NM , SKOH.UNIV_KJ AS H_UNIV_NM , SPL.SP_LIVER_KJ AS SP_LIVER_NM , SPD.SP_DISEASE_KJ AS SP_DISEASE_NM , MYU.TITLE_KJ AS UNIV_POS_CODE_NM , MYT.TITLE_KJ AS TITLE_CODE_NM , CDMJF.VALUE1_KANJ AS JOB_FORM_NM , CDMDC.VALUE1_KANJ AS DCC_TYPE_NM FROM T_RDM_REQ_KNR KNR --- INNER JOIN T_RDM_HCP_REQ HCP ---_ ON 1=1 AND HCP.REQ_ID = KNR.REQ_ID LEFT JOIN M_RDM_HCO_MST HCO ---_ ON 1=1 AND HCO.INS_NO = HCP.INS_NO_SK LEFT JOIN M_RDM_HCP_SHOZOKU_BUKA SBS -- _ ON 1=1 AND SBS.DEPT_CODE = HCP.HOME_DEPT_CODE AND SBS.DEL_FLG = '0' LEFT JOIN M_RDM_HCP_SHOZOKU_BUKA SBK -- _ ON SBK.DEPT_CODE = HCP.DEPT_CODE AND SBK.DEL_FLG = '0' LEFT JOIN T_RDM_M_MDB_HCP_MST ULT -- ULT_MDB ON 1=1 AND ULT.DCF_ISHI_CD = HCP.ULT_DOC_NO LEFT JOIN M_RDM_CODE_MST CDM -- ON 1=1 AND CDM.CODE_NAME = 'REQ_STS' AND CDM.DEL_FLG = '0' AND CDM.VALUE1 = KNR.REQ_STS LEFT JOIN M_RDM_CODE_MST CDMDT -- ON 1=1 AND CDMDT.CODE_NAME = 'DOC_TYPE' AND CDMDT.DEL_FLG = '0' AND CDMDT.VALUE1 = HCP.DOC_TYPE LEFT JOIN M_RDM_CODE_MST CDMMF -- ON 1=1 AND CDMMF.CODE_NAME = 'MF' AND CDMMF.DEL_FLG = '0' AND CDMMF.VALUE1 = HCP.SEX LEFT JOIN M_RDM_CODE_MST CDMHT -- ON 1=1 AND CDMHT.CODE_NAME = 'HOME_TOWN' AND CDMHT.DEL_FLG = '0' AND CDMHT.VALUE1 = HCP.HOME_TOWN LEFT JOIN M_RDM_CODE_MST CDMJF -- ON 1=1 AND CDMJF.CODE_NAME = 'JOB_FORM' AND CDMJF.DEL_FLG = '0' AND CDMJF.VALUE1 = HCP.JOB_FORM LEFT JOIN M_RDM_CODE_MST CDMDC -- ON 1=1 AND CDMDC.CODE_NAME = 'DCC' AND CDMDC.DEL_FLG = '0' AND CDMDC.VALUE1 = HCP.DCC_TYPE LEFT JOIN M_RDM_HCP_SHUSSHINKO SKOM -- _ ON 1=1 AND SKOM.UNIV_FLG = '1' AND SKOM.DEL_FLG = '0' AND SKOM.UNIV_CODE = HCP.MED_SCH LEFT JOIN M_RDM_HCP_SHUSSHINKO SKOH -- _ ON 1=1 AND SKOH.UNIV_IKK_FLG = '1' AND SKOH.DEL_FLG = '0' AND SKOH.UNIV_CODE = HCP.H_UNIV LEFT JOIN M_RDM_HCP_SP_LIVER SPL -- _ ON 1=1 AND SPL.DEL_FLG = '0' AND SPL.SP_LIVER = HCP.SP_LIVER LEFT JOIN M_RDM_HCP_SP_DISEASE SPD -- _ ON 1=1 AND SPD.DEL_FLG = '0' AND SPD.SP_DISEASE = HCP.SP_DISEASE
LEFT JOIN M_RDM_HCP_YAKUSHOKU MYU -- _ ON 1=1 AND MYU.UNIV_TITLE_FLG = '1' AND MYU.DEL_FLG = '0' AND MYU.TITLE_CODE = HCP.UNIV_POS_CODE LEFT JOIN M_RDM_HCP_YAKUSHOKU MYT -- _ ON 1=1 AND MYT.UNIV_TITLE_FLG = '0' AND MYT.DEL_FLG = '0' AND MYT.TITLE_CODE = HCP.TITLE_CODE WHERE 1=1 AND KNR.REQ_ID = #{inReqId}

SELECT KNR.REQ_ID FROM T_RDM_HCP_REQ HCP --_ INNER JOIN T_RDM_REQ_KNR KNR -- ON KNR.REQ_ID = HCP.REQ_ID WHERE KNR.REQ_TYPE = '31' AND KNR.REQ_STS IN ('11','03','13','04','14') AND HCP.ULT_DOC_NO = #{inUltDocNo} AND KNR.REQ_ID != #{inReqId}
